title: Wear GPS Sender
summary: Use your Android Wear or mobile device to share your location using GPS.
description: Simply use your Android Wear (or mobile device) to select a contact and share your exact GPS Location.★ Meeting a friend? useful for when people need to find you.★ Useful if you need to know where you are.You can use Wear GPS Sender to send your GPS location via your Android Wear device or mobile device ★ Android Wear device - Select a contact and just click send. Your GPS location will be sent via SMS.★ Mobile - Click the big GPS button and then choose how you want your GPS location to be sent to your contact.NOTE: The mobile device's GPS MUST be on to send your GPS location via your Android Wear device.
descriptionHTML:
Simply use your Android Wear (or mobile device) to select a contact and share your exact GPS Location.

★ Meeting a friend? useful for when people need to find you.

★ Useful if you need to know where you are.



You can use Wear GPS Sender to send your GPS location via your Android Wear device or mobile device



★ Android Wear device - Select a contact and just click send. Your GPS location will be sent via SMS.

★ Mobile - Click the big GPS button and then choose how you want your GPS location to be sent to your contact.


NOTE: The mobile device's GPS MUST be on to send your GPS location via your Android Wear device.
comments: Good app need one last improvement Works well when you buy the app because you can add your favorite. now even there you need 3 selections before you can send your gps coordinate to your partner. a more straightforward solution and I would put 5 stars. the GPS coordinates sent includes the calculated address which is nice. well done

What I was looking for, but ads in pro version Edit: I've purchased the "unlock everything" option but ads are still showing up when I open the app. Other than that, a few suggestions: It would be perfect if you could edit the standard message from the phone app to a few canned phrases like "meet me here in 30 minutes" or "I need help" or phrases in another language for non-English speakers or for when you travel. Other than that, great job!

Update** Yes I bought all 4 upgrades :) prior to the asking and it still isn't applying the favorites ___  Favorites is not working for me I only get refresh and then have to scroll through contacts even if I have a favorite

Deceiving This apps traps you in buying the version with the advertised functionality. As mentioned by others, scrolling through contacts is purposely made difficult so that you have to buy the version that has the favorites. Greedy developer. Avoid.
Brilliant app!! I like this app so much, view all your contacts, recent calls and send your location all from your watch. Its really unique i haven't seen anything like this!
Awesome! It's so fast to send my location from my watch :)
